content: here comes the bamcal2024 july main square this year some bamcal members desired a little bit easier patterns so i tried to design something interesting in skill level easy no sure if i succeeded- it s up to you to test if it s interesting enough to have fun the theme is the clover with 4 leaves german glücksklee to bring a bit luck to all of us in the middle i played around with the 4- leaves- theme in the outer rounds you can see a meadow with some clover leaves in it hope you enjoy this quick and easy pattern good luck to everyone of you here you can find a pdf glücksklee pdf 1 1 https //padlet com/alexandrazaminer1/crochet-patterns-ayn4uaegwde4a7oo
